_sText:
Here goes a brief description of the map:
Ba_zaker_lava_V2 The map is a map created by me from 0.

In version 1 on my map.
This map has a gun, a volleyball court, a dining room with bananas and oranges, the cells, the isolation room, the prison that contains a door, nursing healing when given with the E key on the cross is inside Nursing, and the room of fire suicide all the time or less also tirandote lava.

In Version 1 added:
A room where there is a garage with a limp and then 2 things at desseos last of the terrorists to launch further Deagle and a roulette wheel.
I've also added as a watchtower.
Y 2 machines to play jump rope or whatever and now in this release, the jetpack is achieved through the aviation armeria door next to where you have to spend 3 doors:
1 - the first door, the VP is the result of the operation (69x69 = pass)
2 - The second door you have to give the correct button, but dying. (The button on the right is the 2 below)
3 - The third door you have to give the correct button, but dying. (The button on the right is the 2 below)
Then in 1 cell is a piece of broken glass that breaks.

--------------------------------------------------
--------------------- V2--------------------------
--------------------------------------------------
The V2 has added a soccer field, a tunnel that passes over the lava that takes you to the elevator where the Soccer Field.
At the request of JordireX Then I added a "Cashier" to make the you have to go through a corridor where there Sorpresa XD (to get to the bank someone will have to commit suicide).

Then I expanded a bit too Cells, and removed lights that had a door.

For everything else is like the V1.
